channel.title: Dungeon Keeper III
channel.description:
I assume most of the older people here on the BMS-forums love DK as much or more than I do therefor I wish to share with you this link: [url]https://warfortheoverworld.com/[/url]
What do you think, does it look promising?
Edit: forgot to post the youtube link before so here it is:[url]https://www.youtube.com/user/WarForTheOverworld[/url]
And as far as I can tell it is a very new project( oldest post seems to be from march 8 )

item.title: Dungeon Keeper III

item.description:
I always used to confuse Dungeon Keeper with Dungeon Master when I was younger.

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeon Keeper III

item.description:
oh lame its another super ambitious hobbyist project. never gonna be finished. Evil Genius is the bst dungeon keeper anyway

item.title: Dungeon Keeper III

item.description:
Ah cool, May have to give it a go… The case is sat staring at me waiting to be installed…

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeon Keeper III
item.dc:creator: JayJay
item.description:
Sidewinder:

Ditto

I spent countless hours on DKII, never really played the first… I may just have to dig out my CD and see if it works on 7 64Bit, IIRC Vista 32Bit disliked it…

It’ll work, but only is software mode, no hardware acceleration So the creatures have faint black lines around them.

Dungeons is fun, but the gameplay is quite different to the DK games. Thanks for sharing the link!! I actually installed DKII yesterday because I was missing it

Read full topic

item.title: Dungeon Keeper III
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
There’s not much to go on yet. But if they can pull it off I will be supremely excited. I’ve been wanting another Dungeon Keeper game forever. I went into a deep depression when Dungeon Keeper III got canceled.

Read full topic
